name: AVG-1425
notes: Opera version 73.0.3856.329 is based on Chromium version 87.0.4280.88 according to https://blogs.opera.com/desktop/2021/01/opera-73-0-3856-329-stable-update/, thus sharing the recently disclosed security issues found in that version of Chromium. Opera version 73.0.3856.344 is based on the fixed Chromium version 87.0.4280.141 according to https://blogs.opera.com/desktop/2021/01/opera-73-0-3856-344-stable-update/.
